page.title: 08RAASAY HOME FARM
page.content: RAASAY HOME FARM IS A MIXED FARM COVERING ABOUT 400 ACRES OF LAND.THE FARM IS RUN BY MR.MACLEAN AND HIS WIFE.THEY HAVE ABOUT 200 SHEEP AND 5 DAIRY COWS, A BOAR AND A SOW.THEY CUT HAY,FOR FEEDING THE ANIMALS IN THE WINTER. THE LIVESTOCK IS USUALLY SOLD AT THE MARKET FROM AUGUST TO OCTOBER.THE BUSIEST TIME OF THE YEAR IS THE LAMBING.AND THE QUITIEST TIME OF THE YEAR IS JUST AFTER THE LAMBING. EVERY DAY THE ANIMALS HAVE TO BE CHECKED AND FED,AND THE COWS MILKED TWICE A DAY.ON AVERAGE EACH COW GIVES ABOUT 4 AND A HALF GALLONS OF MILK IN THE WINTER AND ABOUT 6 AND A HALF GALLONS IN THE SUMMER >THEY SELL THE MILK TO THE PEOPLE OF RAASAY.THEY ALSO MAKE MILK AND CREAM AND YOGHART,BUT NOT CHEESE<BECAUSE IT IS TOO EXPENSIVE AND TIME CONSUMING.
